data.title: University of Valencia
data.text:
Avenue: Blasco Ibáñez, 13.

PC: 46010.

City: Valencia.

Country: Spain.

Phone: 034 963864498.

Email

Website

IRO Email

History and objectives

The Universitat de València is a modern European University founded over five centuries ago devoted to a wide range of disciplines, cutting-edge research and culture pursuing education, learning and research at the highest international levels.

Governing team

Senate.

Governing Council.

Rector.

Executive Council.

Advisory Committees of the central bodies.

Board of Trustees.

International programmes

Erasmus+: study, traineeship, faculty and staff mobility programme.

Non-European mobility.

International Programme.

European projects.

International Mentor Programme (IMP).

International Networks.

Calendar

1st semester: September – January.

2nd semester: February – June.

Departments

92 departmens spread out in 18 faculties covering almost all teaching areas from experimental sciences to engineering, health sciences, humanities, social as well as economic, law and teaching education sciences.

Degrees

Undergraduate

54 undergraduate degrees; 6 dual-degrees; 4 international dual-degrees.

Postgraduate

107 master degrees.

62 PhD programmes.
